scripts.test:e2e:build: start-server-and-test 'cd ../../ && pnpm start' 'http://localhost:3000|http://localhost:3001' 'pnpm exec playwright test tests/build'
scripts.test:e2e:dev: NEXT_PUBLIC_E2E_DEV=1 pnpm exec playwright test tests/dev
scripts.test:e2e:dev:ui: NEXT_PUBLIC_E2E_DEV=1 pnpm exec playwright test tests/dev --ui
